    • Method Detail

      • getLanguageModel

        public String getLanguageModel()
        Get the Model for the Select Component return a String formatted : value=Label,value2=Label2 ...

      • getLangues

        public List<String> getLangues()
        Get the List of Supported Locales. We used trim and toLowerCase methods, in order to return the best value

      • getLangLibelle

        public String getLangLibelle()
        Used when mode=true, in order to get the label of a radio input

      • getLangLibelle

        public String getLangLibelle(String l)
        return the label for a locale. Will checked the Bundle. If no messages are defined in one bundle, we will use the Locale.

      • getLang

        public String getLang()
        Get the current locale.

      • addAdditionalTags

        @AfterRender
public void addAdditionalTags(org.apache.tapestry5.MarkupWriter writer)
        Method will add additional informations for the select component : xml:lang and lang attributes

      • getMode

        public Boolean getMode()
        Return the current Mode

      • getBlank

        public org.apache.tapestry5.corelib.data.BlankOption getBlank()
        Used by the Select Component. It will not have a Blank Option

      • ajaxRequest

        @OnEvent(value="languageSelected")
public Object ajaxRequest(@RequestParameter(value="lang")
                         String l)
        Method catching the Language_Selected event. We will redirect the user to the current page.

      • getLegend

        public String getLegend()
        Return the Legend. If not specify in one of the Client's bundles, we will use the Kawwa default bundle.
